name: merge_tool
description: Merge firmwares and generate bootload scripts
author: Raphael Bernhard <beraphae@gmail.com>

scripts.build-dev: electron-build-env neon build && webpack --config webpack.renderer.config.js --mode=development && webpack --config webpack.main.config.js --mode=development
scripts.build-prod: electron-build-env neon build --release && webpack --config webpack.renderer.config.js --mode=production && webpack --config webpack.main.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build-dev-windows: electron-build-env neon build --release && webpack --config webpack.renderer.config.js --mode=development && webpack --config webpack.main.config.js --mode=development
